name: great_wall_of_china
title: Great Wall of China
desc: A historic fortification built over centuries to protect Chinese states from invasions.

name: petra
title: Petra
desc: An archaeological city in Jordan famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.

name: christ_the_redeemer
title: Christ the Redeemer
desc: An iconic statue of Jesus Christ overlooking Rio de Janeiro from Mount Corcovado.

name: machu_picchu
title: Machu Picchu
desc: A 15th-century Inca citadel nestled high in the Andes Mountains of Peru.

name: chichen_itza
title: Chichen Itza
desc: A large pre-Columbian city built by the Maya, known for the El Castillo pyramid.

name: roman_colosseum
title: Colosseum
desc: A massive ancient amphitheater in Rome, Italy, that hosted gladiator contests.

name: taj_mahal
title: Taj Mahal
desc: A white marble mausoleum in Agra, India, symbolizing eternal love.
